title: Interviews with the builders of ACMI @ Federation Square
brief_description: There are two segments - the first with Philip Walsh walking down and back along the old platform 15, 16 during demolition and the second part (and the priority) is of Don Bates presenting the drawings to Nigel Milan from SBS
